title: Emin Özmen
text:
Emin Ozmen (born 1985) is a Turkish photographer, <a href="photojournalist">photojournalist</a> and film maker based in <a href="Istanbul">Istanbul</a>. He has worked especially on <a href="Turkey">Turkey</a>, on refugees and in the wider Middle East, including <a href="Syria">Syria</a> and <a href="Iraq">Iraq</a>.
In 2013 he founded a photography <a href="cooperative">cooperative</a> named Agence Le Journal, which is based in Istanbul.
In 2017, he became a nominee member of <a href="Magnum%20Photos">Magnum Photos</a>.
